channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday in Wisconsin is a reality!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sheila Acker
item.dc:creator: Sheila Acker
item.description: Thank you for the kind words Ted. I canâ€™t wait to work with you as one of our regional mentors - this is going to be a blast!

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Yes, I was wondering about it as well. And, of course, if it can be conducted on Sunday instead of Saturday. I'd love to come and I have a friend who may want to also come.
item.content:encoded: Yes, I was wondering about it as well. And, of course, if it can be conducted on Sunday instead of Saturday. I’d love to come and I have a friend who may want to also come.

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: Ted - any thoughts on date & location? I figure I can be anywhere in the state in a few hours if I don't have to give Denis a ride ;)
item.content:encoded: Ted – any thoughts on date & location? I figure I can be anywhere in the state in a few hours if I don’t have to give Denis a ride ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
That would be awesome if you could make it, Pat!

Denis, I drove the 14+ to Philly, you can drive the 16 to WI ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Hope you enjoy the event…the drive from Princeton is only 958 mi, 16 hours 28 mins ðŸ˜‰

Seriously, I think SQL Saturdays are one of the best things that could have happened to the SQL Server community

item.title: By: Pat Wright
item.dc:creator: Pat Wright
item.description: Google lists the distance for me as 1372miles....But I'm not sure if I can miss this. :) I need to start working on travel plans now. :)

item.title: By: Leonard
item.dc:creator: Leonard
item.description: Thanks to Jes & Ted and the board of MADPASS for all your hard work getting this far! I'm excited to be involved in bringing SQL Saturday to Wisconsin!
item.content:encoded: Thanks to Jes & Ted and the board of MADPASS for all your hard work getting this far! I’m excited to be involved in bringing SQL Saturday to Wisconsin!
